Articles.Content:
Put them together to make  a book.

The Novel Mountains.

The first page of the Novel is a new page.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-02-18T18:23:27Z" title="02/18/2022 06:23  PM" data-short="2 yr">February 18, 2022</time> by ColdJ**

Lovecraft visits them for the first time.

The Mountains of Madness,

The world can sometimes be a bit much.

The Mountains of Sadness.

They are hungry and start gaming.

The Mountains of Katniss.

The Mountain Range.

The Teeth of the World.
The Jawz
We are going to need a bigger Hill.

Olympus Mons

No hill bigger.  
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tallest_mountains_in_the_Solar_System](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tallest_mountains_in_the_Solar_System)

(Rheasylvia is cheating.)

#rheasylviaisnotmountain
Agents of Shield Volcano.

Tara Reid is in game.

Sharkano

I fake a hill. 

My fake hill.

The Hill is complete-fantasy now: a dwarven fortress inside and an elven forest on the surface.

Fantasy Hill

> 
> 
> Just now, Nazalassa said:
> 
> 
> The Hill is complete-fantasy now: a dwarven fortress inside and an elven forest on the surface.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Fantasy Hill
> 

I made this hill and build a underground ICBM base in the hill. 

MY ICBM base hill.

The dwarves destroy it

Non-ICBM fantasy hill

Balrog eats both destroyed and non-destroyed ICBM. And the dwarves.

Moria.

Jabawaki attack.

Wonderland Hill.

Kerbal Wonder Landing

Spoiler

![oyimk2yswr121.jpg?auto=webp&s=8a260708da](https://preview.redd.it/oyimk2yswr121.jpg?auto=webp&s=8a260708da8a14566213d039b9be7879e101050a)

I build a ICBM and blown up everything.

My empty space.

The repair team has repaired the former silo place and plants a garden on it.

Silo Park

I put a Tsar Bomba in the park because I love Tsar Bomba.

My radioactive empty space.

I remove every way to take a hill.

And I create a control point.

My control point.

I am blu engineer and I take the control point.

I deploy a level 3 sentry on the control point.

My defence control point.

Tsar didn't have a Bomba.

Nuke failed.

So I make a Castle Bravo.

BTW I has posts hidden.

The castle is full of show-business celebrities, and their flame makes it burn twice per day.

Burning Castle
